display: Renal Diet Decrease protein and salt intake Limit protein intake to 0.8 g/kg/day in adults with or without diabetes with GFR less than 30 mL/minute/1.73 m² Avoid high protein intake (greater than 1.3 g/kg/day) in adults at risk for chronic kidney disease progression Limit salt intake to less than 2 g per day in adults

relatedArtifact.display:
Renal Diet


	Decrease protein and salt intake



	Limit protein intake to 0.8 g/kg/day in adults with or without diabetes with GFR less than 30 mL/minute/1.73 m²



	Avoid high protein intake (greater than 1.3 g/kg/day) in adults at risk for chronic kidney disease progression



	Limit salt intake to less than 2 g per day in adults
relatedArtifact.citation: Chronic Kidney Disease Clinical Overview. ClinicalKey. Source
